name: .YUMTX File Extension
summary: Learn about .YUMTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Yellowdog Updater, Modified (YUM), a command-line utility for Linux operating systems, such as Fedora, CentOS, and Red Hat Enterprise Linux, that use the RPM Package Manager; contains transaction data that can be loaded at a later time to repeat a transaction.

content: The YUMTX files are created after every transaction, even if it's cancelled, and placed in the /​tmp/​ folder. The file can be helpful, as it allows you to quickly run previous transactions.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
